ClassFile 
 public ClassFile(DataInputStream s) throws ClassFormatError, IOException
Build a parsed class file from a data stream

Parameters:
s - the DataInputStream to parse

flatten 
 public byte[] flatten() throws ClassFormatError, IOException
Turn a parsed class file into a class file byte array

Returns:
a byte array in the form of a class file which would parse to the same ClassFile state as this ClassFile's state.
getConstantPool 
 public Constant[] getConstantPool()
All fields in a class file are publicly accessible so that other packages (e.g., the e coverage tool) can reach them. See the Java Virtual Machine Specification for their descriptions.

getAccessFlags 
 public int getAccessFlags()
getThisClass 
 public int getThisClass()
getSuperClass 
 public int getSuperClass()
getInterfaces 
 public int[] getInterfaces()
getFields 
 public Field[] getFields()
getMethodArray 
 public Method[] getMethodArray()
getAttributes 
 public Attribute[] getAttributes()
getClassObject 
 public ConstantClass getClassObject() throws ClassFormatError
Get the ConstantClass object for this class

Returns:
the ConstantClass object.
Throws: ClassFormatError
if the this class index in the class file does not designate a constant table entry of type ConstantClass.
getSuperClassObject 
 public ConstantClass getSuperClassObject() throws ClassFormatError
Get the ConstantClass object for the superclass of this class

Returns:
the ConstantClass object.
Throws: ClassFormatError
if the superclass index in the class file does not designate a constant table entry of type ConstantClass.
poolEntry 
 public Constant poolEntry(int i)
Get an entry from the Constant Pool

Parameters:
i - index of the constant pool entry to return.
Returns:
the constant at index i in the constant pool.
getClassName 
 public String getClassName(int i) throws ClassFormatError
Get the class name of a ConstantClass entry in the constant pool

Parameters:
i - index of the constant pool entry to return.
Returns:
the fully qualified class name as a string with dot separators.
getAttribute 
 public Attribute getAttribute(String name)
Get an attribute.

Parameters:
name - the name of the attribute
Returns:
the attribute or null if none matches.
methods 
 public Enumeration methods()
Get an Enumeration over all the methods in the class.

Returns:
an Enumeration over all the methods in the class.
fields 
 public Enumeration fields()
Get an Enumeration over all the fields in the class.

Returns:
an Enumeration over all the fields in the class.
references 
 public Enumeration references()
Get an Enumeration over all the references out from the class.

Returns:
an Enumeration over all the references out from the class. This enumeration returns all the defined ConstantRefTypes.
interfaces 
 public Enumeration interfaces()
Get an Enumeration over all the interfaces implemented by the class.

Returns:
an Enumeration over all the implemented by the class. This enumeration returns ConstantClass objects.
append 
 public void append(Field newField)

 public void append(Method newMethod)
Add a new method to the list of methods in this class.

Add new elements to the constant pool.
